channel.title: The Data Liberation Project
channel.description: Recent content on The Data Liberation Project

item.title: Wage and Hour Violations
item.description: We’re requesting the data behind a processing system that enables investigators, managers, and assistants in the Wage and Hour Division (WHD) to process, manage and investigate alleged labor violations.

item.title: Federal Inmate Deaths
item.description: A spreadsheet of each federal inmate death since 2005, including demographic and cause-of-death information.

item.title: Boating Accident Report Database
item.description: Data on 58,430 boating accidents that occurred in 2009–2023 and were reported to state authorities.

item.title: Oil Spill Response Costs
item.description: Incident reports, contractor authorizations, invoices, and other documents related to Coast Guard–administered oil spill responses.

item.title: Federal Inmate Deaths
item.description: We’re data records representing each federal inmate death from 2005 to the present.

item.title: Excess Defense Article Transfers
item.description: We’re requesting an updated copy of the Department of Defense’s Excess Defense Articles transfer database.

item.title: Federal Inmate Complaints
item.description: Data on 1.78 million complaint/appeal submissions filed by federal prison inmates between January 2000 and late May 2024, spanning nearly 1 million distinct cases.

item.title: Commercial Fishing Incident Database
item.description: A national database of “fatalities and vessel disasters that occur in the US fishing industry.”

item.title: Army Slot Machines
item.description: We’re requesting detailing the presence, operation, and finances of slot machines on military property.

item.title: National Adult Maltreatment Reporting System
item.description: Agency- and case-level data from “the first comprehensive, national reporting system for adult protective services programs.”

item.title: Housing Discrimination Complaints and Cases
item.description: We’re requesting records from HUD databases that track complaints by people alleging housing discrimination and the agency’s inquiries into those cases.

item.title: FEMA Disaster Housing Database Documentation
item.description: Documentation of database systems FEMA uses to track the “direct housing” assistance the agency provides people affected by major disasters.

item.title: USDA Food Purchase Database Documentation
item.description: Records documenting the USDA’s Web Based Supply Chain Management System, used for coordinating the purchase and distribution of federal food and commodity orders.

item.title: Firearm Background Check Counts
item.description: Monthly counts of firearm background checks run by the FBI by month, state, and firearm type.

item.title: USDA Organic Program Enforcement
item.description: Outcomes of investigations spurred by complaints submitted to the USDA’s National Organic Program.

item.title: Water Use Inventory Records
item.description: Site-level records from the USGS’s water use inventory, indicating volumes of and types of water conveyed in a given year.

item.title: Political Candidates’ Airline Credit
item.description: We’re requesting records submitted by airlines regarding credit they’ve extended to political candidates for federal office.

item.title: Medicare "Level 2" Appeals
item.description: We’re requesting database records tracking the circumstances and outcomes of patients' appeals of Medicare insurance decisions.

item.title: Medicare Appeals System (MAS) Documentation
item.description: We’re requesting records that document the functionality of CMS’s Medicare Appeals System.

item.title: TSA Complaint Counts
item.description: Monthly counts of Transportation Security Administration traveler complaints by airport, category, and subcategory.

item.title: USDA Organic Program Enforcement
item.description: We’re requesting records from the National Organic Program’s enforcement database.

item.title: Animal Welfare Investigations (APHIS ITEMS)
item.description: We’re requesting records from Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service’s Investigation Tracking and Enforcement Management System (ITEMS).

item.title: Unaccompanied Child Incident Reports
item.description: Incident reports submitted by government-funded facilities caring for unaccompanied immigrant children.

item.title: CFPB Enforcement Relief & Penalties
item.description: Amounts and dates of court-ordered relief and penalties in Consumer Financial Protection Bureau enforcement matters.

item.title: Peace Corps Resignation Counts
item.description: Counts of resigned Peace Corps volunteers by post and resignation reasons.

item.title: DOD Child and Domestic Abuse Incidents
item.description: We’re requesting records from the Department of Defense’s child and domestic abuse incident reporting system.

item.title: Collective Bargaining Notices (FMCS F-7)
item.description: We’re requesting detailed data on notices of “upcoming collective bargaining” submitted to federal labor mediators.

item.title: Veterans Affairs SSVF Survey Data
item.description: Data and reports from satisfaction surveys evaluating VA Supportive Services for Veteran Families (SSVF) program providers.

item.title: USDA Data Inventories
item.description: A spreadsheet listing nearly 3,000 active, retired, and proposed Department of Agriculture databases and information systems.

item.title: “Acute Hospital Care at Home” Data
item.description: Waiver applications and weekly/monthly reporting metrics from hospitals participating in the Acute Hospital Care at Home program.

item.title: DOL File Plans and EIS Listings
item.description: Department of Labor files describing the physical/digital locations of key records, plus listings of the agency’s major “electronic information systems”.

item.title: Defense Sexual Assault Incident Database (DSAID)
item.description: We’re requesting data from the Department of Defense’s “authoritative, centralized case-level database used to collect and maintain information on sexual assaults involving members of the Armed Forces.”

item.title: CFPB Enforcement Matters
item.description: We’re requesting database records representing the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau’s enforcement efforts.

item.title: USPS Rural Route Evaluations
item.description: We’re requesting data the Postal Service uses in determining compensation for rural mail carriers.

item.title: Theft/Loss of Controlled Substances
item.description: Counts and quantities of controlled substance and regulated chemical thefts/losses reported to the DEA, by state, business activity, and loss type, and year.

item.title: Bills of Lading (Cargo Manifests)
item.description: We’re requesting comprehensive records on the cargo shipped into and out of the United States.

item.title: Public Housing Tenant Terminations
item.description: We’re requesting data on public housing authorities' removals of tenants from public and subsidized housing.

item.title: Student Loan Cancer Treatment Deferments
item.description: We’re requesting data on cancer treatment deferment requests by borrowers of student loans.

item.title: CFBP Enforcement Database Documentation
item.description: A six-page document describing the structure of ENForce, CFPB’s “enforcement matter management system.”

item.title: Peace Corps Resignations
item.description: We’re requesting database records from the Peace Corps indicating volunteers' reasons for resignation.

item.title: Military Housing: Environmental Health & Safety
item.description: We’re requesting data from the “environmental health and safety module” of the database the Department of Defense uses to track its housing assets.

item.title: DOL File Plans and EIS Listings
item.description: We’re requesting all Department of Labor “file plans” and electronic information system listings.

item.title: Hazmat Transportation Incident Reports
item.description: Decades of hazardous material transportation incidents reported to the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration via Form 5800.1.

item.title: EEOC Integrated Mission System Documentation
item.description: Documentation of the main database that the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission uses to track discrimination complaints and investigations.

item.title: EPA Risk Management Program Database
item.description: Data from the Risk Management Plans submitted by US facilities handling certain hazardous substances.

item.title: APHIS Inspection Reports
item.description: Data on Animal Welfare Act inspections of commercial animal dealers, exhibitors (such as zoos), research facilities, and transporters.

item.title: National Adult Maltreatment Reporting System
item.description: We’re requesting data from “the first comprehensive, national reporting system for adult protective services programs.”

item.title: CFPB Enforcement Database Documentation
item.description: We’re requesting documentation of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau’s database tracking its enforcement efforts.

item.title: National Water Use Inventory
item.description: We’re requesting a copy of the “comprehensive national water use inventory” mandated by Secure Water Act of 2009.

item.title: FMCS Case Management System Schema
item.description: A database schema provided by the Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service, appearing to document the agency’s case management system.

item.title: Commercial Fishing Incident Database
item.description: We’re requesting a national database of “fatalities and vessel disasters that occur in the US fishing industry.”

item.title: USDA Data Inventories
item.description: We’re requesting Department of Agriculture records describing its inventories of data and “major information systems.”

item.title: Boating Accident Report Database
item.description: We’re requesting the Coast Guard’s national database of recreational boating accidents.

item.title: “Acute Hospital Care at Home” Data
item.description: We’re requesting data from a recent CMS program “providing eligible hospitals with unprecedented regulatory flexibilities to treat eligible patients in their homes.”

item.title: Elevated Blood Lead Levels In Public Housing
item.description: We’re requesting the database HUD uses to track elevated blood lead levels in children living in public and voucher-based housing.

item.title: DOI Data Inventories
item.description: We’re requesting Department of the Interior records describing its inventories of data and “major information systems.”

item.title: Work Stoppages
item.description: We’re requesting data collected by federal mediators on the characteristics of work stoppages (strikes and lockouts).

item.title: Oil Spill Response Costs
item.description: We’re requesting data related to the costs of oil spill responses, collected through several Coast Guard forms.

item.title: USDA Food Purchases
item.description: We’re requesting the database that USDA uses to track food purchased for the National School Lunch Program and other major initiatives.

item.title: EEOC Integrated Mission System Documentation
item.description: We’re requesting documentation of the main database that the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission uses to track discrimination complaints and investigations.

item.title: Lead Paint Remediation In Public Housing
item.description: We’re requesting the database HUD uses to track progress abating lead-based paint hazards in public housing.

item.title: Long COVID Questionnaire Responses
item.description: We’re requesting questionnaire responses collected through the government’s flagship study of adults with Long COVID, part the billion-dollar RECOVER Initiative.

item.title: Automated Targeting System Documentation
item.description: We’re requesting documentation of a major Customs and Border Protection database.

item.title: Unaccompanied Children: Oversight Records
item.description: We’re requesting Office of Refugee Resettlement records relating to the care of unaccompanied children.

item.title: EPA Risk Management Program Database
item.description: We’re requesting the EPA’s Risk Management Program (RMP) database, which contains risk management plans and accident histories submitted by “facilities that use extremely hazardous substances.”

item.title: Federal Inmate Complaints
item.description: We’re requesting data stored in one particular component of the Bureau of Prison’s SENTRY database — records that track inmates' formal complaints and the agency’s responses.

item.title: SSVF Satisfaction Surveys
item.description: We’re requesting data from the satisfaction surveys that providers in the VA’s Supportive Services for Veteran Families program must send to recently-exited participants.

item.title: Public Housing Inspections
item.description: We’re requesting a HUD database that contains all the inspections of public housing properties in the US, including each property’s detailed scores and deficiencies.

item.title: FEMA Disaster Housing
item.description: We’re requesting the database that FEMA uses to track the “direct housing” assistance it provides to people affected by major disasters.

item.title: Radiation Exposure Compensation Claims
item.description: We’re requesting data on all Radiation Exposure Compensation Act claims filed, as well as the government’s handling of those claims.

item.title: Student Loan Data Documentation
item.description: We’re requesting database documentation for several major Department of Education systems that track student loans.

item.title: Theft and Loss of Controlled Substances
item.description: We’re requesting database records from the DEA’s Theft Loss Reporting system, which collects information about controlled substances that have gone missing.

item.title: About
item.description: The what, why, how, when, where, and who of the Data Liberation Project.

item.title: Contact Information
item.description: Feedback, questions, suggestions? Get in touch.

item.title: Get Involved
item.description: The Data Liberation Project welcomes collaborators, pro bono lawyers, funders, and pretty much anyone else.

item.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
item.description: We’ll send you semi-regular news about our records requests, datasets liberated, partnership opportunities, and helpful resources.
